name: Residences at 338A
description: A 46-unit freehold apartment located at 338A River Valley Road. Completed in 2004. Facilities include a swimming pool and gymnasium.

name: Goodwood Gardens
description: A 29-unit residential apartment at 4 Balmoral Crescent. Facilities: BBQ pits, basement car park, fitness corner, gymnasium, 24-hour security, swimming pool, wading pool.

name: The Ventana
description: A 39-unit freehold apartment development at 95 Pasir Panjang Road. Amenities: swimming pool, 24-hour security, jacuzzi, BBQ pits, gym, clubhouse, billiards room.

name: Symphony Heights
description: A 449-unit freehold residential development at 33–45 Hume Avenue. Features include round balconies, swimming pools, and open grasslands.

name: Kovan Esquire
description: A 23-unit freehold condominium at 47 Kovan Road. Completed around 1998.

name: Wai Wing Centre
description: A 16-unit mixed-use development (shops, offices, residential) at 501 Balestier Road. Freehold, completed in 1991 near Novena MRT and TTSH.

name: Kovan Crest
description: A 20-unit freehold condominium at 45 Kovan Road. Completed in 1999, near Kovan MRT station.

name: Palisades
description: An 18-unit freehold condominium at 294 Pasir Panjang Road. Completed in 1985 near West Coast MRT, Haw Par Villa, and Kent Ridge Park.

name: 10 Surrey Road
description: A 13-unit freehold residential development at 10 Surrey Road, district 11. Completed in 2002, near Novena MRT.

name: Fernhill Cottage
description: A 14-unit low-density townhouse at Fernhill Road. Features include a swimming pool, children’s pool, BBQ. Near Orchard Road.

name: Mont Timah
description: A 32-unit 99-year leasehold condominium at Bukit Way. Near Bukit Gombak MRT.

name: Petro Centre
description: A 40-unit industrial light-use development at Jalan Kilang Barat. Near Redhill MRT.

name: Equatorial Apartments
description: A 61-unit freehold apartment at 48–54 Meyer Road, near Singapore Indoor Stadium. Completed in 1977.

name: Island View
description: A 72-unit freehold development at Jalan Mat Jambol. Completed in 1984 near Pasir Panjang MRT, Alexandra Hospital, and Kent Ridge Park.

name: Hume Park II
description: A 328-unit freehold development at Hume Avenue. Completed in 1997.

name: Hillview 128
description: A 90-unit 999-year leasehold apartment at 124 Hillview Avenue. Completed in 2001.

name: Leonie Towers
description: A 92-unit freehold apartment development located at 28 Leonie Hill. Completed in 1975, 24 storeys tall, near Tangs and Fort Canning Park.

name: Villa Chancery
description:
VILLA CHANCERY is located at 39 CHANCERY LANE.
Facilities provided at the condominium includes a swimming pool and a squash court

name: Ridgewood
description:
A 464 units residential development located at 1 Ridgewood Close.
Condo facilities include swimming pool, sauna, gymnasium, tennis courts, squash courts, fitness corner, mini-mart, covered car park, 24 hours security, playground, and BBQ pits

name: 8 Orange Grove
description:
A 19 unit residential development located at Orange Grove Road.

8 Orange Grove is a freehold development located at 8 Orange Grove Road, Singapore 258342, in District 10, minutes away from Orchard MRT Station. Completed in 1986, it stands 15 storeys tall and comprises of 19 units. 8 Orange Grove is close to Singapore Botanic Gardens and esteemed clubs like Tanglin Club and The Pines Club.

Condo Facilities at 8 Orange Grove:
Covered carpark

Condo Amenities near 8 Orange Grove:
Numerous feeder bus services are available near 8 Orange Grove. It is also close to local and international schools, such as Raffles Girls’ Secondary School, ISS International School, and Overseas Family School.

8 Orange Grove’s proximity to Orchard Road brings residents close to several one-stop shopping destinations, such as Ion Orchard, Takashimaya, Wisma Atria, and The Paragon, where a suite of amenities can be found like supermarkets, boutique shops, banks, restaurants, eating establishments, cinema, library, and more.

For vehicle owners, driving from 8 Orange Grove to the business hub takes 10 – 15 minutes, via River Valley Road.
